extendedInfo.description: The most innovative Forex trading platform available on the Android! Enjoy a genuine Android application with the following features:  - Live, secure and persistent connection with server  - Lowest FX spreads (starting from 0.5 pips)  - ECN liquidity (100-200 mio on majors)  - Instant order execution  - Wide range of trading orders (including stop / limit / bid & offer )  - OCO / merge functionality  - Access to the trading reports Big set of FX tools included:  - Live Charts with technical analysis  - FX Market News  - Economic Calendars  - Forex TV  - Daily High/LowIn order to let you trade your account from anywhere, app supports Edge/3G/Wi-Fi connection types with an automatic connection control system that adapts data flow size depending on the connection speed. To try this App you need SWFX demo account. You are able to register an account directly from the application.DISCLAIMER: This application is part of the SWFX Marketplace Trading System and can be used to access DEMO accounts. Any information provided by the application does not constitute a forecast of the market value of any instrument at any time and is not an investment advice or recommendation in any form. Users of the platform must keep in mind that means of trading never eliminate, reduce, or even alter market risks, that is, the risk arising from price fluctuations, changes or jumps. While the efficient use of an electronic means of trading may improve the management of several aspects of risk present in the investment process, it has no effect on the nature of the risk itself. As a result, users are strongly encouraged to review their internal risk management procedures in order for them to fully understand and integrate the potential implications of the use of any electronic means for trading. Users of the application must fully understand the operational risks inherent to the use of electronic means of trading. Although the features and operational environment of the application are optimized, improved, and tested, some residual risk may remain. Operational risks include, but are not limited to: Technical failures, loss of phone network, human failures, communication failures and other.

reviews.title: Not bad
reviews.comment: It is not bad. It need update to fix auto exiting, adding option to merge opend position, auto convert the P/L of the opened position to the account curencey, and fixing the stability of the charts when rotating the device from portrait to landscape. Also it needs to have charts filter for weekends candles.
reviews.author: Mohammed AlAjaj

reviews.title: Like a bad beta on Galaxy Note II
reviews.comment: Locks up within 5 minutes of use. Usually happens when trying to zoom or scroll. ALWAYS reverts from selected chart period to the default period when device rotated. Way too limited on number of indicators. Try putting on moving  4 moving averages at one time. Could you do it? Put on a stochastic. Now overlay another stochastic in the same window. Could you do it? Where are custom chart periods?  I want 4 minute and 8 minute. Where are they?
reviews.author: D Strawser

reviews.title: It doesnt work
reviews.comment: I can\'t login I don\'t know why and I\'m sure I\'m typing my username, password, and pin correctly and yes I also checked if I have caps lock on and it\'s not. I am able to login to the web version though from my mobile so I am putting my correct credentials.
reviews.author: Marlon Alona

reviews.title: No positions shown
reviews.comment: After update no open positions shown! Unable to close any positions!
reviews.author: Terry Lim

reviews.title: Buggy app
reviews.comment: Encounter freeze, blank screen, auto exiting, app reset. very poor.
reviews.author: Tan Lip Seong

reviews.title: Great application
reviews.comment: Great application, works pretty smooth on my device, easy to use.
reviews.author: Fao Lo

reviews.title: Not as smooth as iphone app
reviews.comment: Not able to use multiple indicators like several moving averages...only allowed to use one....plus switching time frames is not as accessible as iphone app...
reviews.author: Siddharth Shahani

reviews.title: Nice app
reviews.comment: Overall is great but my equity keep displaying 1k usd all the time while my real equity is different and limited indicators. Hope the next update can solve these problems
reviews.author: Wilfred Lau

reviews.title: Gr8
reviews.comment: FC are finally gone. Easy to use, good charts.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great broker got even better.
reviews.comment: I was waiting for this app for a long time. The ability to alter open positions anywhere anytime was the missing part, which has been solved. It would be nice to have a widget to monitor positions and distances to SL and TP.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Top Mobile FX Site
reviews.comment: Runs pretty smooth, few minor bugs, so use with caution, overall well done, can we draw lines on charts soon?

reviews.title: Nice app
reviews.comment: Like this easy platform! Can view currency charts, trade through Market tab and manage orders in Portfolio Tab. New version fixed reconnect problem.

reviews.comment: IT is Live now, guys. Why people find it so difficult to read? The previous version of this app was just an alpha. Now it is more or less finalized. Works fine on my HTC desire.
